name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A crowd-pleaser with spicy pepperoni, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: Delightful combination of fresh vegetables, mozzarella cheese, and a light tomato base.

name: Supreme Pizza
description: Loaded with pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: Sweet and savory with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: A carnivore's dream with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ground beef.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Grilled chicken, red onions, and a sweet BBQ sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Mushroom and Spinach Pizza
description: A flavorful vegetarian option with mushrooms, spinach, and garlic.
